institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 12 (Support details and support funds)
contents: Article 12 (Support details and support funds) ① Supporting companies may receive support for part or all of the costs required for the following activities: 1. Learning group activities, 2. Support from external experts 3. Support for disseminating best practices (learning network activities) , support for in-house learning group competitions), 4. Support for building learning infrastructure 5. Other activities necessary for learning organization, ② The chairman provides support within the amount approved for each applicant company depending on the content of support and support limit., ③ Support for each applicant company The content and support limit can be applied differently depending on the number of years of project implementation and implementation performance of the supporting company.
